scripts.build:core: rimraf core && copyfiles src/core/package.json src/core/CHANGELOG.md LICENSE.md -f core && copyfiles README.md -f core && copyfiles lib/cjs/YuanPlayer.js lib/cjs/YuanPlayer.min.js lib/mjs/YuanPlayer.js lib/mjs/YuanPlayer.min.js lib/umd/YuanPlayer.js lib/umd/YuanPlayer.min.js core
scripts.build:theme-yuan: rimraf theme-yuan && copyfiles src/themes/yuan/package.json LICENSE.md -f theme-yuan && copyfiles src/themes/yuan/README.md -f theme-yuan && copyfiles lib/cjs/YuanPlayerThemeYuan.js lib/cjs/YuanPlayerThemeYuan.min.js lib/mjs/YuanPlayerThemeYuan.js lib/mjs/YuanPlayerThemeYuan.min.js lib/umd/YuanPlayerThemeYuan.js lib/umd/YuanPlayerThemeYuan.min.js theme-yuan
scripts.build:theme-monday: rimraf theme-monday && copyfiles src/themes/blueMonday/package.json src/themes/blueMonday/CHANGELOG.md LICENSE.md -f theme-monday && copyfiles src/themes/blueMonday/README.md -f theme-monday && copyfiles lib/cjs/YuanPlayerThemeBlueMonday.js lib/cjs/YuanPlayerThemeBlueMonday.min.js lib/mjs/YuanPlayerThemeBlueMonday.js lib/mjs/YuanPlayerThemeBlueMonday.min.js lib/umd/YuanPlayerThemeBlueMonday.js lib/umd/YuanPlayerThemeBlueMonday.min.js theme-monday
scripts.build:theme-pinkflag: rimraf theme-pinkflag && copyfiles src/themes/pinkFlag/package.json src/themes/pinkFlag/CHANGELOG.md LICENSE.md -f theme-pinkflag && copyfiles src/themes/pinkFlag/README.md -f theme-pinkflag && copyfiles lib/cjs/YuanPlayerThemePinkFlag.js lib/cjs/YuanPlayerThemePinkFlag.min.js lib/mjs/YuanPlayerThemePinkFlag.js lib/mjs/YuanPlayerThemePinkFlag.min.js lib/umd/YuanPlayerThemePinkFlag.js lib/umd/YuanPlayerThemePinkFlag.min.js theme-pinkflag
